embeds.title: Python Region Changer Script
embeds.description: A tool that allows manual selection of game server regions. By modifying the system's hosts file to block certain servers, it helps bypass automatic region selection—ideal for those wanting more control over matchmaking without using a VPN.

fields.name: Instructions:
fields.value:
1. Download the latest version of [Python](https://www.python.org/downloads/).
2. Download and run [RegionChanger.py](https://github.com/Bloodpoint-Farming/Dead-by-Daylight-Region-Changer/releases/latest/download/RegionChanger.py).
  - [Windows instructions](https://github.com/Bloodpoint-Farming/Dead-by-Daylight-Region-Changer/blob/main/README.md#windows-setup)
  - [Linux instructions](https://github.com/Bloodpoint-Farming/Dead-by-Daylight-Region-Changer/blob/main/README.md#linux-setup)
2. To change region, type it's corresponding number and press ENTER.
  - Restart DBD.
3. To restore the hosts file, type '0' and press ENTER.
  - Restart DBD.

embeds.title: Manual Hosts File Overrides
embeds.description: Manually change your hosts file without the need for scripts or administrative permissions.

fields.name: Instructions:
fields.value:
1. Backup your `C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\hosts` by copying and saving it elsewhere.
2. Download [dbd-hosts-file-overrides-main.zip](https://github.com/Bloodpoint-Farming/dbd-hosts-file-overrides/archive/refs/heads/main.zip).
3. To change region, copy the `hosts` file for your desired region from the zip and paste it in the path from Step 1.
  - Restart DBD.
4. To restore the hosts file, copy your backup `hosts` file and paste it in the path from Step 1.
  - Restart DBD.
